restrictionInstructions.dataDistribution: To be made available to all S1000D users.

exportRegistrationStmt.simplePara: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is to be at the discretion of the organization.

restrictionInstructions.dataHandling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
restrictionInstructions.dataDestruction: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
restrictionInstructions.dataDisclosure: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.

listItem.para: This material is provided "As Is" and neither ASD nor any person who has contributed to the creation, revision or maintenance of the material makes any representations or warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to, warranties of merchantability or fitness for any particular purpose.

Neither ASD nor any person who has contributed to the creation, revision or maintenance of this material shall be liable for any direct, indirect, special or consequential damages or any other liability arising from any use of this material.
Revisions to this document may occur after its issuance. The user is responsible for determining if revisions to the material contained in this document have occurred and are applicable.

restrictionInfo.dataConds: There are no known conditions that would change the data restrictions for, or security classification of, this data module.

descrWireNumber.descr: The wire number is the unique identifier for all electrical wires installed on the bicycle.

descrWireType.descr: Wire type identifies the electrical wire in coded form, eg AP.

descrWireGauge.descr: Wire gauge identifies the gauge of the wire in coded form, eg. 010.

descrPartNumber.descr: Wire part number gives the part number of the wire.

descrHarnessIdent.descr: Harness ident identifies the harness in which the wire is pre-assembled.

descrWireSeqNumber.descr: Contains the sequential number of the wire, e.g. in the harness.

descrWireInfoCircuitIdent.descr: Contains the identifier of the circuit to which the wire belongs.

descrWireInfoSectionIdent.descr: Contains the identifier of the section to which the wire belongs.

descrLength.descr: Length identifies the length of the wire. The given value is approximately 10% higher than necessary to install the wire on the bicycle.

descrWireColor.descr: Color identifies the color of the wire sheating.

descrTwist.descr: Twistig identifies wires, which are twisted together with a unique identifier.

descrFunctionalItemRef.descr: Electric ident shows the electrical identification, to which the wire is connected. It is available for all electrical equipment, eg L1.

descrContact.descr: Contact identifies the electrical contact to which the wire is connected.

descrGroupCode.descr: Identifies wires, which are connected to the same terminal lug.

descrScreen.descr: Screens identifies all screens that shield the wire. Wires shielded by the same screen are identified by the same screens value.

descrResponsiblePartnerCompany.descr: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the wire to the bicycle.

descrFeedThru.descr: Identifies bunges through which the wire is routed.

descrNextHigherAssy.descr: Identifies the next higher assenbly, in which the wire is installed.

descrHarnessIdent.descr: Harness ident identifies pre-assembled wires, which are installed on the bicycle.

descrPartNumber.descr: Harness part number gives the part number of the harness identified by the harness ident.

descrHarnessVariantIdent.descr: Harness variant identifies the variant of the harness in addition to the harness part number.

descrHarnessVariantIssue.descr: Harness issue identifies the production variant of the harness in addition to the harness part number.

descrHarnessName.descr: Harness nomenclature identifies the harness by using a specific name.

descrEmcCode.descr: Harness separation code gives the separation code of the harness.

descrMinTemperature.descr: Minimum temperature gives the minimum environment temperature in which the harness can be used.

descrMaxTemperature.descr: Maximum temperature gives the maximum environment temperature in which the harness can be used.

descrHarnessEnvironment.descr: Harness environment indicates that a harness is used in high vibriation or/and hydraulic areas.

descrSleeve.descr: Gives the part number and/or the material of the sleeves used on the harness.

descrResponsiblePartnerCompany.descr: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the harness to the bicycle.

descrFunctionalItemRef.descr: Electric ident shows the electrical identification, which is available for all electrical equipment, eg L1.

descrPartNumber.descr: Part identification shows the part number of the equipment. In most cases the part number is identical to the part desciption.

descrInstallationLocation.descr: Location shows the installation position of the equipment on the bicycle.

descrNextHigherAssy.descr: Next higher assenmbly identifies the box or panel, in which the equipment is installed.

descrPositionOnNextHigherAssy.descr: Gives the position on the next higher assenmbly, in which the equipment is installed.

descrMaxMountingPositions.descr: Gives the maximum number of mounting positions on the next higher assembly.

descrSiblingPlugIdent.descr: Sibling plug identification contains the electric ident of the mating connector.

descrTransverseLink.descr: Transverse link shows external or internal electrical connections of the equipment.

descrResponsiblePartnerCompany.descr: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the equipment to the bicycle.

descrReqQuantity.descr: Gives the quantity of multiple occurence equipment.
